alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Okfuskee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 3:18AM CDT until July 11 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Okfuskee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 400 AM CDT. * At 318 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Okemah, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Okemah... Weleetka... Hanna... Bearden... Clearview... Raiford... Pharoah... Vernon... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 213 and 231. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
